meanings.definition: A type of green algae often used as a dietary supplement.
meanings.sent1: Chlorella is a green algae that some people take as a supplement.
meanings.sent2: Many health enthusiasts believe in the benefits of chlorella as a supplement.
meanings.sent3: The chlorella in my smoothie makes me feel like a healthy superhero!
meanings.sent4: Her glowing skin was compared to the vibrant green of chlorella.
meanings.sent5: The chlorella's rich green color reminded me of a lush forest.

meanings.definition: A genus of single-celled green algae.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study chlorella to learn more about single-celled algae.
meanings.sent2: The pond was teeming with various species of chlorella.
meanings.sent3: The chlorella under the microscope seemed to wave hello.
meanings.sent4: In the world of tiny organisms, chlorella reigns as a green monarch.
meanings.sent5: The chlorella multiplied rapidly, filling the water with vibrant life.
